column1: ; Rakontu skins - to add a skin, add a column and fill it in.
; Except for font names all others are hex color codes.
; All numeric hex colors must have quotes around them.
; Don't change the first column - these must match names in the source code!
; The names of skins (which are displayed to the user) can be translated.
; Skin names must be unique (no two the same).
; In the file "language_config.py" there is a DEFAULT_SKIN_NAME setting. Its value MUST match one of these names. It is what skin is used before the Rakontu's managers have selected a skin.

column4: Garamond, Baskerville, Caslon, Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif'

to indicate the user is entering data
entry grid on home page, annotation grid on entry page
